pr_title: Be more lenient when handling gossip errors

timeline.message: Be more lenient when handling gossip errors

timeline.bodyText:
From my perspective I would Ignore only the cases when we are 100% sure this is not the remote peer guilt.
I'm almost sure there are still cases when other exceptions could be thrown beside DecodingException and this could be the attack target and in this case the peer would not be banned. IMHO it's better to unfairly ban a honest peer than keep being DoSed by a malicious peer.
timeline.author: Nashatyrev

replies.bodyText: Yeah, on second thought this makes a lot of sense 👍  And we do log a warning, so we should be able to detect any cases where we're being too strict.
replies.author: mbaxter

timeline.author: Nashatyrev
